about_the_game:
****************************************************************************************************************************************
“Revolutionaries are spreading around the world, kings are being condemned to the guillotine, our debt keeps growing, and the army is dissatisfied with us.
This will be a difficult reign, try not to be murdered or deposed and make sure our government will not fail ...
.... In fact, none of this matters, do what you want, all people end up the same way. "

****************************************************************************************************************************************

Features:
Five different endings.
Four minigames
Multiple choices and routes
Events that react to your decisions
Easter eggs
Secrets

****************************************************************************************************************************************

But remember, this game is not what it sounds like.

"Don't trust him"

highlighted.name: Se mil tronos eu tivesse, mil tronos eu perderia
I will make stalin look like a fucking anarchists
Soon he will be drinking blood as though it were water
Pensavi fosse Mammona, ma ero io, Dio!

detailed_description:
****************************************************************************************************************************************
“Revolutionaries are spreading around the world, kings are being condemned to the guillotine, our debt keeps growing, and the army is dissatisfied with us.
This will be a difficult reign, try not to be murdered or deposed and make sure our government will not fail ...
.... In fact, none of this matters, do what you want, all people end up the same way. "

****************************************************************************************************************************************

Features:
Five different endings.
Four minigames
Multiple choices and routes
Events that react to your decisions
Easter eggs
Secrets

****************************************************************************************************************************************

But remember, this game is not what it sounds like.

"Don't trust him"
name: O Rei

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista or 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

supported_languages:
English, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
